name: GZCLP Tier 3 — 3×15 AMRAP Progression (~5 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 sets x ~45-60s each + 1-1.5 min rest => ~4-6 min total
spec_movement: lat pulldowns, rows, or similar accessories
overview_and_execution: Perform 3×15 with the last set as AMRAP. When you reach ~25 reps on the final set, increase the load next session. Keep rest around 1–1.5 min.
example_application: If T3 lat pulldown is 60 lb for 15, 15, and 20 on the last set, work up to ~25 on that last set before adding 5 lb.
important_notes: Use a controlled tempo and focus on form. The AMRAP final set drives progress; add weight once you hit 25 reps.
volume_metrics: At least 45 reps total each session (3×15+).
